62 void dataFromFileHandler(vector<PointPtr>& groundtruth_points , int iteration)
63 {
64  cout << "Scan number: " << iteration << endl;
65 
66  vector<PointPtr> groundtruth_points_filtered;
67 
68  //Filter the laser points
69  filterPoints(groundtruth_points,groundtruth_points_filtered,0.01,50);
70  cout<<"end"<<endl;
71  //Sort them by label
72  vector<PointPtr> groundtruth_points_filtered_sorted = groundtruth_points_filtered;
73  sort(groundtruth_points_filtered_sorted.begin(),groundtruth_points_filtered_sorted.end(),comparePoints);
74 
75  //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
76  //Make GT clusters
77 
78  vector<ClusterPtr> clusters_GT;
79  convertPointsToCluster(groundtruth_points_filtered_sorted, clusters_GT);
80  //Remove GT clusters with less than a certain size
81  uint minimum_points = 3;
82  vector<PointPtr> groundtruth_small_points_removed = groundtruth_points_filtered;
83  removeInvalidPoints(groundtruth_small_points_removed, clusters_GT, minimum_points);
84 
85  vector<ClusterPtr> clusters_nn;
86  double threshold_nn = 0.25;
87  nnClustering( groundtruth_points_filtered, threshold_nn , clusters_nn);
88 
89  vector<ClusterPtr> circle;
90  Point sphere;
91  find_circle(clusters_nn,circle,sphere);
92  // Vizualize the Segmentation results
93 
94  visualization_msgs::MarkerArray targets_markers;
95 
96  //Apply transformation on circles in relation to sick_lmrs
97  if(sphere.x==0)
98  {
99  sphere.x =-1000;
100  sphere.y =0;
101  sphere.z =0;
102  }
103 
104  targets_markers.markers = createTargetMarkers(clusters_nn,circle,sphere);
105 
106  markers_lms_1_pub.publish(targets_markers);
107 
108  cout<<"done all"<<endl;
109 
110 } //end function
111 
119 double find_circle(vector<ClusterPtr> clusters, vector<ClusterPtr>& circleP, Point & sphere)
120 {
121  geometry_msgs::PointStamped centroid;
122  int count=0;
123  for(int k=0;k<clusters.size();k++)
124  {
125  ClusterPtr cluster=clusters[k];
126  int segment_init, segment_end;
127  for (int i=0;i<cluster->support_points.size();i++)
128  {
129  // Apply algorithm from
130  /*Fast Line, Arc/Circle and Leg Detection from
131  Laser Scan Data in a Player Driver
132  João Xavier∗ , Marco Pacheco† , Daniel Castro† , António Ruano† and Urbano Nunes*/
133 
134  segment_init=0;
135  segment_end=cluster->support_points.size()-1;
136 
137  // Detect if at least 6 points
138  double angle[1000];
139  double angle_std;
140  double vecA[3],vecB[3];
141  int n=0;
142  if (segment_end-segment_init>=6)
143  {
144  for (int j=segment_init+1; j<segment_end-1; j++)
145  {
146  // use 3D but actually Z = 0 because laserscan is planar
147  vecA[0] = cluster->support_points[segment_init]->x - cluster->support_points[j]->x;
148  vecA[1] = cluster->support_points[segment_init]->y - cluster->support_points[j]->y;
149  vecA[2] = cluster->support_points[segment_init]->z - cluster->support_points[j]->z;
150 
151  vecB[0] = cluster->support_points[segment_end]->x - cluster->support_points[j]->x;
152  vecB[1] = cluster->support_points[segment_end]->y - cluster->support_points[j]->y;
153  vecB[2] = cluster->support_points[segment_end]->z - cluster->support_points[j]->z;
154 
155  angle[n] = acos( inner_product(vecA, vecA+3, vecB, 0.0)
156  / (sqrt(pow(vecA[0],2) + pow(vecA[1],2) + pow(vecA[2],2)) * sqrt(pow(vecB[0],2) + pow(vecB[1],2) + pow(vecB[2],2))));
157  n++;
158  }
159 
160 
161  // compute average angle and std
162  double m=0;
163  double std=0;
164 
165  for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
166  m += angle[j];
167 
168  m = m/n;
169  for ( int j = 0; j < n; j++ )
170  {
171  std += pow((angle[j]-m),2);
172  }
173 
174  std = sqrt(std/(n-1));
175 
176  // conversion to degree
177  m = m/M_PI*180;
178  std = std/M_PI*180;
179 
180  if (m>105 && m<140 && std < 5)
181  {
182  // Circle information computation
183  double theta = (m-90)/180*M_PI;
184  // use 3D but actually Z = 0 because laserscan is planar
185  double middle[3];
186  middle[0] = (cluster->support_points[segment_end]->x - cluster->support_points[segment_init]->x)/2;
187  middle[1] = (cluster->support_points[segment_end]->y - cluster->support_points[segment_init]->y)/2;
188  middle[2] = (cluster->support_points[segment_end]->z - cluster->support_points[segment_init]->z)/2;
189 
190  double h = sqrt(pow(middle[0],2) + pow(middle[1],2) + pow(middle[2],2)) * tan(theta);
191  double height[3];
192  height[1]= sqrt( (middle[0]*middle[0]*h*h) / (middle[0]*middle[0] + middle[1]*middle[1]) );
193  height[0]= - middle[1]*height[1]/middle[0];
194  height[2]= 0;
195 
196  double circle[3], radius;
197  circle[0] = cluster->support_points[segment_init]->x + middle[0] - height[0];
198  circle[1] = cluster->support_points[segment_init]->y + middle[1] - height[1];
199  circle[2] = cluster->support_points[segment_init]->z + middle[2] - height[2];
200  //radius = sqrt(pow((circle[0]-cluster->support_points[segment_init]->x),2) + pow((circle[1]-cluster->support_points[segment_init]->y),2) + pow((circle[2]-cluster->support_points[segment_init]->z),2));
201 
202  double ma,mb,cx,x1,x2,x3,cy,y1,y2,y3;
203  x1=cluster->support_points[segment_init]->x;
204  x2=cluster->support_points[round(segment_end/2)]->x;
205  x3=cluster->support_points[segment_end]->x;
206  y1=cluster->support_points[segment_init]->y;
207  y2=cluster->support_points[round(segment_end/2)]->y;
208  y3=cluster->support_points[segment_end]->y;
209 
210  ma=(y2-y1)/(x2-x1);
211  mb=(y3-y2)/(x3-x2);
212 
213  cx=(ma*mb*(y1-y3)+mb*(x1+x2)-ma*(x2+x3))/(2*(mb-ma));
214  cy=-1/ma*(cx-(x1+x2)/2)+(y1+y2)/2;
215 
216  //radius=sqrt(pow((cx-x1),2) + pow((cy-y1),2));
217 
218  Point Centroid;
219  double R;
220  CalculateCircle(cluster,R,Centroid);
221  radius=R;
222 
223  centroid.point.x=Centroid.x;
224  centroid.point.y=Centroid.y;
225 
226  double ballDiameter = BALL_DIAMETER;
227 
228  if(radius>ballDiameter/2)
229  radius=ballDiameter/2;
230  centroid.point.z=(sqrt(pow(ballDiameter/2,2)-pow(radius,2)));
231  sphere.x=centroid.point.x;
232  sphere.y=centroid.point.y;
233  sphere.z=centroid.point.z;
234  cout<<"x "<<centroid.point.x<<endl;
235 
236  double centre[3];
237  centre[0] = Centroid.x;
238  centre[1] = Centroid.y;
239  centre[2] = centroid.point.z;
240 
241  //writeFile(centre,"lms_dist_2.txt");
242 
243  circlePoints(circleP,radius,centre,20);
244  if(!circleP.empty())
245  circleP[count]->centroid=cluster->centroid;
246  count++;
247  checkCircle=1;
248  }
249  else
250  {
251  if(checkCircle==0)
252  {
253  centroid.point.x=0;
254  centroid.point.y=0;
255  centroid.point.z=-10;
256  sphere.x=-10000;
257  sphere.y=centroid.point.y;
258  sphere.z=centroid.point.z;
259  }
260  }
261  }
262  }
263  }
264  centroid.header.stamp=ros::Time::now();
265  circleCentroid_pub.publish(centroid);
266 }
267 
274 int main(int argc, char **argv)
275 {
276  ros::init(argc, argv, "sick_lms151");
277  ros::NodeHandle n;
278  sickLMSscan scan;
279 
280  markers_lms_1_pub = n.advertise<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>( "/markers2", 10000);
281  circleCentroid_pub = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::PointStamped>( "/laser1/sphereCentroid", 10000);
282 
283  //ros::Rate loop_rate(1);
284 
285 while(1)
286 {
287  C_DataFromFilePtr data_gt;
288  cout<<"size "<<scan.scanLaser1.ranges.size()<<endl;
289  vector<PointPtr> points;
290  if(scan.scanLaser1.ranges.size()!=0)
291  {
292  convertDataToXY(scan.scanLaser1, data_gt);
293 
294  createPointsFromFile(points, data_gt);
295  scan_lms_1_header=data_gt->iteration;
296 
297  dataFromFileHandler(points , scan_lms_1_header);
298  }
299 
300  ros::spinOnce();
301  //loop_rate.sleep();
302 }
303  return 0;
304 }
